definition: a slat of wood in the middle of the back of a straight chair, flatten on impact
details:
noun
- a slat of wood in the middle of the back of a straight chair
- a single splash
= example: a single splash
verb
- flatten on impact
= example: flatten on impact
- split open and flatten for cooking
= example: split open and flatten for cooking
- give off the sound of a bullet flattening on impact
